description: unfired clay; square form with overlapping, entwined, nude figures; figures holding baby on top and on one side; figures holding chalice on one side; mounted on board
dimension: 13 x 12 x 11 in. (33.02 x 30.48 x 27.94 cm) (without board)
text: This tzedakah box was awarded first place out of forty-two entries in a juried competition.  The artist's objective was to celebrate the hope and sense of community derived from the act of giving tzedakah (giving to those less fortunate.)
title: Hope for Tomorrow
